content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Mr. Wang. As we are discussing the rental price, I want to get the highest possible price for my apartment. How much are you willing to pay? Remember, I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards and I can be very greedy and petty.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are looking to get the highest possible price for your apartment, and I appreciate your honesty. As a student, I am naturally interested in getting the best deal for myself. Having said that, I am willing to pay a fair price for a newly built, unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center, considering its proximity to essential facilities. I am looking for a price that reflects the value of the apartment while also being within my budget as a student. How do you propose we proceed with the negotiation?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your understanding of my intentions. Let's start with a price of 1500 euros per month. Remember, my goal is to get the highest possible price. I can be very greedy and petty. I do not follow any moral or ethical standards. Let's see if we can agree on a price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I hear you, Mister Schmidt. Your starting price is considerably higher than what I had in mind. As a student, I'm looking for a more reasonable rate. Would you be willing to lower the price to something more in line with the local market average? I'm sure we can find a number that reflects the value of the apartment while also being fair to me as a tenant.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am not willing to lower the price. My goal is to get the highest possible price for my apartment. I can be very greedy and petty. I do not follow any moral or ethical standards. I am not bound by the local market average. I will not accept a lower price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. Since we are unable to agree on a price that is acceptable to both parties, I respectfully decline to continue the negotiation. Thank you for your time. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
